column4: hello. i need a small kick in the ass to come to a solution with ubuntu feisty fawn. its running on a notebook with internal cardreader, and everything works fine, as long as the card is inside of that reader while booting. is there any GUI for mountin / unmounting cards?
can you unplug/replug the card and then dmesg | tail   does sda or sdb or whatever show up?
ive heard people report similar thing but never ran into it myself
